title: Disappearance of Madeleine McCann
summary: Madeleine Beth McCann (born 12 May 2003) disappeared on the evening of 3 May 2007 from her bed in a holiday apartment at a resort in Praia da Luz, in the Algarve region of Portugal. The Daily Telegraph described the disappearance as "the most heavily reported missing-person case in modern history".[4] Her whereabouts remain unknown,[5] although German prosecutors believe she is dead.[6]
